frame.name: BaseTime
frame.subtitle: Onchain Social Calendar
frame.description: BaseTime is a social onchain calendar that lets users view, create, and share events in the Base ecosystem. RSVP to events and mint Event Pass NFTs as proof of attendance.

discovery.og_description: Discover, create, and share events in the Base ecosystem. RSVP to events and mint Event Pass NFTs as proof of attendance.
discovery.twitter_description: Discover, create, and share events in the Base ecosystem. RSVP to events and mint Event Pass NFTs as proof of attendance.
